A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So much has been said already. All I'll say is this was simply poor story telling. Okay\, no\, I'll say a little bit more. The humor was painfully out of place. The villains constantly came across as schmucks. No one in their right mind would be afraid of this New Order. And there was absolutely no reason\, none at all\, for that ultimately useless side quest to the casino.
